"This creature is but a sack of dried up skin that feels oily and

"The soft body seem resilient against otherwordly powers and fire,
but all physical attacks seem effective."

A pile of flesh remains here...
"It's you my friend! I'm happy to see you made it."
"I apologise for leaving you like that.\. There were some bumps in
"But what's important is that you're here. Still alive and strong."
"How could you leave me like that!?"
"Thank you for helping me in the first place."
"How could you leave me like that!?"
"I tried to lure those locals elsewhere, to give you a fair chance.
But it took me by surprise just how many of them there were..."
"It does of course not excuse my behaviour, but believe me, I did
try to get back to you as soon as possible."
"I hope you do not hold too deep of a grudge."
"Thank you for helping me in the first place."
"I'm sure you would've done the same if our roles were reversed."
\c[1]"I feel sorry for these people, but I have a job to finish."\c[0]
\c[1]"Can't get attached to anyone. Even in the slightest."\c[0]
"Good afternoon. A foggy day, isn't it?"
"Yes... I've done my fair share of practice as a youngling."
"Didn't know back then that all the blisters in my hands would be
"But alas - duty calls. I must bid you farewell."
"Sightseeing the city for the most parts."
"I do like the compact size of it all. Makes it easy to traverse
"I quite haven't found what I'm looking for yet, so if you don't
mind, I must bid you farewell for now."
\c[1]"I feel sorry for these people, but I have a job to finish."\c[0]
\c[1]"Can't get attached to anyone. Even in the slightest."\c[0]

\N[16] is staring calmly at the distant horizon...
\N[17] is looking around, mouth open, being his clueless
\N[19] seems itchy and twitchy. He is constantly scratching
himself. Even from places that are not suitable to public...
\N[22] tilts his head sideways as you try to communicate
\N[28] has got an oddly pleased expression on his face. His
disturbed smile gives you the creeps...
\N[29] looks very tense and stiff. Seems like he cannot have
a moment's rest as he's waiting for your next orders.
"This school building seems to remain scot-free in the midst of
"A lot of shops in this area... Despite being an old fashioned little
town in the middle of nowhere, there are a lot of modern boutiques
"It's funny. I used to really like the shopping district when I
"Seeing it turn into this eerie place... Feels bad."
"You don't suppose we could take a look?"
"Seeing how everything else is in this miserable place, I bet even
the ice cream would find a way to kill us."
"Yup. It's probably mutated into a killer cone by now."
"And yes. Of course you could lick it. It's ice cream after all."
"D-did you see something moving in the mist?"
"No matter. Stay behind. I'll go first."
Levi is staring at the orphanage with a grim look on his face.
"...Do we really need to be in this part of the town?"
"I see we are in the material district. The decline of the mankind
is the most visible in areas like these."
"Aren't you a positive one? You must be fun at parties."
"Sarcasm is the lowest form of wit."
"Ups and downs are just part of everyday life. Much like in a fight
you take hits and give hits. Without the bad bits it would just become
plain and we couldn't appreciate the good parts."
